mapper.select: SELECT pb.id, pb.create_at as createAt, pb.update_at as updateAt, pb.status, pb.note, pb.user_id as userId, pt.price, pt.pitch_id as pitchId, pt.time_slot_id as timeSlotId, p.name as pitch_name as pitchName, p.address, pt1.name as type, ts.start_time as startTime, ts.end_time as endTime FROM pitch_booking pb join pitch_time pt on pb.pitch_time_pitch_id = pt.pitch_id and pb.pitch_time_time_slot_id = pt.time_slot_id Join pitch p on p.id = pb.pitch_time_pitch_id join pitch_type pt1 on p.pitch_type_id = pt1.id join time_slot ts on pt.time_slot_id = ts.id where pb.id = #{id}

SELECT pb.id, pb.create_at as createAt, pb.update_at as updateAt, pb.status, pb.note, pb.user_id as userId, pt.price, pt.pitch_id as pitchId, pt.time_slot_id as timeSlotId, p.name as pitchName, p.address, pt1.name as type, ts.start_time as startTime, ts.end_time as endTime FROM pitch_booking pb join pitch_time pt on pb.pitch_time_pitch_id = pt.pitch_id and pb.pitch_time_time_slot_id = pt.time_slot_id Join pitch p on p.id = pb.pitch_time_pitch_id join pitch_type pt1 on p.pitch_type_id = pt1.id join time_slot ts on pt.time_slot_id = ts.id where pb.user_id = #{user_id} and pb.status like #{status} ORDER by pb.create_at DESC
Select COUNT(id) from pitch_booking where user_id = #{user_id} and status like #{status} group by user_id
mapper.insert: insert into pitch_booking (status, note, pitch_time_pitch_id, pitch_time_time_slot_id, user_id) value(#{status},#{note},#{pitchId},#{timeSlotId},#{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE pitch_booking SET update_at = #{updateAt}, status = #{status}, note = #{note}, pitch_time_pitch_id = #{pitchId}, pitch_time_time_slot_id = #{timeSlotId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT pb.id, pb.create_at, pb.`status` AS status_book, p.name AS name_pitch, p.address, u.email, u.fullname, u.phone_number, ts.start_time, ts.end_time, pt.price FROM pitch_booking pb INNER JOIN pitch p ON pb.pitch_time_pitch_id = p.id INNER JOIN time_slot ts ON pb.pitch_time_time_slot_id = ts.id INNER JOIN user u ON pb.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN pitch_time pt ON p.id = pt.pitch_id AND ts.id = pt.time_slot_id WHERE pb.id = #{id}
